CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system , the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system has higher EQE values of 30-40 % in the range of 450-850 nm , which contributes to the improvement of I SC from 11.31 to 14.87 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph you provided, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTDPP(Bu) |
| PCBM |
| PC 70 BM |

Note that "PCBM" and "PC 70 BM" are both referring to the same material, with the difference being the percentage of PC (polycarbonate) in the blend.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTDPP(Bu) |
| PCBM |

The following entities were removed:

* "PC" - This is not a material name, but rather an abbreviation for "polycarbonate", which is a component of the material "PCBM".
* "I SC" - This is not a material name, but rather an abbreviation for "short-circuit current".
* "EQE" - This is not a material name, but rather an abbreviation for "external quantum efficiency".

The remaining entities, "PDTP", "DTDPP(Bu)", and "PCBM", are clearly referring to material names.
